Rulings.Tengu:
● The only way you can Special Summon this card is via its own procedure.
Even if it was initially summoned that way, you still can't summon it with card effects.

Rulings.Base:
1. "Reptilianne Vaskii" cannot be Special Summoned except from your hand by the method written on the card.
2. The effect to destroy 1 face-up monster targets that monster.
3. If the target of the effect of "Reptilianne Vaskii" is face-down when this effect resolves, the monster is not destroyed.
4. You can Tribute 1 of your 0 ATK monsters and 1 of your opponent's 0 ATK monsters to Special Summon "Reptilianne Vaskii".

PSCT.Tengu:
© Can't be Normal Summoned/Set. 
© Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by tributing 2 face-up monsters with 0 ATK from either field.
① Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; destroy it.
© There can only be 1 face-up "Reptilianne Vaskii" on the field.
